summary: Based on a true story, a troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|Patrick Wilson|Kerry Washington|Ron Glass|Justin Chambers|Jay Hernandez|Regine Nehy|Jaishon Fisher|Robert Pine|Keith Loneker|Caleeb Pinkett|Robert Dahey|Ho-Jung|Dallas Raines|Michael Sean Tighe|Valeri Ross|Dartenea Bryant|Elizabeth Tulloch|Dale Godboldo|Lynn Chen|Wiley M. Pickett|Vincent Laresca|Paul Terrell Clayton|Jeff Cockey|Wrenna Monet|Tabitha Taylor|Khira Thomas|Cassius M. title: Protegidos por su enemigo
